title: Inception
plot: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but faces a mission where he must plant an idea instead.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into chaos.

title: Interstellar
plot: A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: Titanic
plot: A romance blossoms aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic, which tragically sinks after hitting an iceberg.

title: The Bourne Identity
plot: A man with amnesia discovers he is a trained assassin while being hunted by mysterious forces.
